scripts.build-css: node-sass-chokidar src/style/ -o public/ --output-style=compressed && node-sass-chokidar src/style/ -o src/style/ --output-style=compressed && node-sass-chokidar src/style/ -o build/  --output-style=compressed
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/style/ -o src/style/ --watch --recursive
